title: tieuminhtoan
author: tieuminhtoan
content: Dear all, I have a hosting in Nic.ru All payment worldwide can not pay for themThey only accept Sberbank, Qiwi and Yoo Money Who can help me or trusted site exchange BTC to them ? Thanks

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: I'm assuming you have an account in one of those banks and have checked their current state just in case, you may try BISQ.network or localcryptos.comI thought i should mention we have a russian local board, see: Pyccкий (Russian)

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: tieuminhtoan on May 10, 2022, 07:36:09 AMThey only accept Sberbank, Qiwi and Yoo Money Who can help me or trusted site exchange BTC to them ? In addition to the above options, BestChange has a list of reliable exchanges for each of these pairs:Note: I prefer to not vouch, so make sure to DYOR prior to using any of those platforms!BTC to SberbankBTC to QiwiBTC to Yoo Money

comments.author: Din116
comments.body: I can send rubles to Sberbank, Tinkoff, Qiwi, the amount per day is from 1k to 500k, no commission 0%, ready for cooperation, write to telegram @Dj625.

comments.author: metrinenabes
comments.body: I COULD BE OF  GREAT HELP. ESPECIALLY with QIWI RUB. GOT very LITTLE WITH SBERBANK but still do quite some amount. I AM A DEALER IN SOME ONLINE TOKEN CREDITS AND SOME OF MY RUSSIAN CUSTOMERS PAY WITH QIWI.
